details.message: CT - CPC+ submissions must contain a practice site address. Please refer to the 2020 IG for more details https://ecqi.healthit.gov/sites/default/files/2020-CMS-QRDA-III-Eligible-Clinicians-and-EP-IG-v1.1-508.pdf#page=25 regarding practice site addresses.

CT - The Alternative Payment Model (APM) Entity Identifier is not valid.  Here is a link to the IG section on identifiers: https://ecqi.healthit.gov/sites/default/files/2020-CMS-QRDA-III-Eligible-Clinicians-and-EP-IG-v1.1-508.pdf#page=15
